## 命令行下载

```bash
curl -L -o quotes.csv https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rksk102/bonjourr-chinese-quotes/main/quotes.csv
# 或（CDN 加速）
curl -L -o quotes.csv https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rksk102/bonjourr-chinese-quotes@main/quotes.csv
```
